Arguments.Text: he noticed that there was no furniture in the room at all , not even a chair
he noticed that there was no furniture in the room at all , not even a chair
he pretended to be in too great a hurry to see anything around him
' oh , my lord , we can find no work and have eaten nothing for two days ! ' answered she . ' nothing remains for us but to die of hunger . '

' no , no , you sha n't do that , ' cried the king , ' or if you do , it will be your own fault . you shall come with me into my palace . you will feel as if you were in paradise , i promise you . in return , i only ask one thing of you , that you shall obey my orders exactly . '
